features: Universal Fit: Compatible with 8 oz narrow-neck baby bottles, our 4-pack handles suit popular brands like Dr Brown's, NUK, Tommee Tippee and AVENT.
Safety Priority: Made from premium silicone, BPA-free, ensuring a safe and toxin-free experience for your baby.
Easy Grip: Ergonomic design for little hands, encouraging independent drinking and a smooth transition from bottle to cup.
Durable Build: High compression strength and flexibility withstand baby's twists and pulls during gripping, ensuring long-lasting use.
Smart Design: Hollowed on one side for easy monitoring, eliminating the need to remove handles. Convenience for parents in a 4-pack.
body.description: PandaEar 4-Pack Baby Bottle Handles, crafted for an effortless transition from bottle to cup. Compatible with 4oz and 6oz narrow-neck baby bottles, these handles are made from premium food-grade silicone for a safe and comfortable grip. With a durable and flexible design, they encourage independent drinking while withstanding the twists and pulls of early gripping attempts. The innovative hollowed design on one side allows for easy monitoring without handle removal. Convenient and dishwasher-safe, this 4-pack offers a practical solution to support your baby's developmental journey with simplicity and peace of mind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for his bottles
reviews.reviewText: My grandson has wanted to be a little more independence and start holding his own bottle but has struggled. This has been great for him! It’s also easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Too large for glass Dr. Brown bottles
reviews.reviewText: Advertised for Dr. Brown narrow bottles but they are too large and slip right off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far they have worked well, just a little bit of a pain to get on. Once on the bottle, they stay on really well.They are too big for the 4oz glass bottles, but fit well on the 8oz glass bottles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 6 month old can hold his bottle!
reviews.reviewText: My grandson is just starting to reach for things and hold them. With handles on BOTH sides of his bottle, he's holding it like a champ. This will only get better as he gets older and more coordinated. The handles fit perfectly to his bottle and came in cute, muted colors. This is a game changer when you need to feed your baby in the car or for those times you can't hold the bottle for them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Be sure to check SIZE of bottle before trying to use this
reviews.reviewText: This silicone is very stiff and difficult to stretch onto the bottle. I thought this was truly “universal” and it even listed “Avent”. As I’m trying to figure out why this was so VERY difficult to try to get this on our Philips Avent bottle… I now see that it says for use “with 4oz and 6oz narrow-neck baby bottles” - that is very important information that you need to know. The bottle that I was trying to use is wider at the top & bottom, and concave shape in the middle. So this doesn’t work for us. We tried to twist the silicone to turn to see the amount left in the bottle (good feature) - however, the silicone was so tight that we couldn’t get it to twist around. There was no information sent with these to say what size bottle to use them on. This is too small for our bottles. I still think that the silicone should stretch easier to make it useful for more sizes and not be so stiff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stays on Glass Bottles Well
reviews.reviewText: Stays on glass bottles well without any worry of it slipping out. They are very tight for a secure hold and the handles for baby’s hand easily. I like the cut out so you can still see the measurements of the bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Is 100% not compatible with Dr brown narrow bottles, way to big

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are good quality. However they are for the bigger bottles. I have the 4oz bottles so these are too big.
